resources.string: Make sure to connect to the power and enjoy the App

Firmware version is out of date
Please confirm bluetooth is turned on

Failed to connect to server, please check your internet setting！

I\'m sorry,the device camera has issue,please restart your device.
The device will remember the last light state and use it when the light is powered on.
Save your favorite light as default.
Flowing state cannot be used as default
Long press\"on/off switch\"to start delay timer, turn off after \n%1$d minute(s)
Long press\"on/off switch\" on top of the Bedside Lamp to start delay timer
Turn off the light after %1$d minute(s)
Timer can only be set when the light is on
Within the time you set, you can swipe the touch wheel to turn on your lamp with gentle light that makes your eyes comfortable
Failed to retrieve data from Night Light, Please try again later
The brightness of the light will be gradually increasing 30 minutes before waking up to simulate a natural and gentle sunrise. It helps to prepare your body for wake up
Failed to retrieve data from Wake-up Light, Please try again
After "Caller Notification\" is activated,Bedside Lamp will flicker to notify you within the time set
Toggle Shortcut added to home screen
Dimmer Shortcut added to home screen
Scene Shortcut added to home screen
Your device won\'t be able to control the device after unlink.
Please describe the issue to help us provide the best solution.
Network error, please check your network setting
Server error, please try again later
Your feedback helps us make Yeelight better.
Are you sure to erase all the data and settings stored on the device?
Please turn on bluetooth of your phone and keep your device close to the phone.
1.Device is correctly powered; \n2. If it was not the initial installation, please reset your device.

Switch the bulb on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the bulb will start flashing. After 5 seconds, it will restart and show white color, which means the bulb has been reset to default.

Switch the bulb on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the bulb will start flashing color. After 5 seconds, it will restart and show white color, which means the bulb has been reset to default.

Directly press and hold the RESET button on the bottom panel with a pin for approximately 5 seconds, release the RESET button after the light start to flash. If you can see the light flash for 5 seconds and then go off, that means the light has been reset successfully.

Switch the ceiling light on and off five times in a row (2 seconds on and 2 seconds off), then the ceiling light will start breathing. After 5 seconds, it will restart automatically and turn on white light, which means the ceiling light has been reset to default.

Simultaneously press the “on/off” and “Mode” button for 5 seconds, it will start flashing color. After 3 seconds, the bedside lamp will restart automatically and turn on white light, which means the ceiling light has been reset to default.

Unplug the power adapter, press the on/off button and meanwhile plug in the power adapter. Holding the button for 5 more seconds until the strip begins to show red, green, blue in turn. Release the button and the LED indicator will turn yellow, which means reset successfully.
Please make sure your network is under 2.4 GHz frequency band Wi-Fi and key in the correct password in order to add new device
Please select device to add. If it’s not on the list, please make sure it is reset correctly.
Are you sure to delete this device?
Are you sure to delete this remote?
Automatic turn off, after you full sleep
Keep your Mi Band close to the phone and make sure your Mi Band is paired with Mi Fit
Keep your Mi Band close to the phone and make sure your Mi Band is paired with Mi Fit
Please make sure Mi Fit is the lastest version
A Mi Band paired with your phone, tap \"Pair\" to complete
Pair with Mi Band, Lamp will be auto-turned off after you fall asleep
Mi Band paired,the lamp will auto-off after you fall asleep
The lamp will not auto-off once it’s unpaired

string.name: login_agreement2
string.u: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

resources.string: After enabling Child Mode, the color temperature will be limited between 2700K-4000K to reduce the blue light ratio. This will help to prevent eyes from blue light damage.
Yeelight app requires Location Permissions in order to discover and set up nearby devices.
Yeelight app requires Location Service in order to discover and set up nearby devices.
Yeelight will enable Third Party Control Protocol. User can discover and control LED devices by using the provided protocol.
Click “Save” to save the current state as the default power state.Turn on this state after power outage.
The music flow only works when your phone and lights are under the same local network
Start Music Flow to change the colors of your light\n based on the surrounding sound.

"Enabling “Bluetooth Device Sharing within LAN”, authorized user within the same local network can discover and control a Bluetooth device. 
 Please note: 
1. Only connected online devices can be shared. 
2. Device sharing are permitted to toggle(on/off), adjust brightness, apply scene and color pick."

The network information of the light had been modified, please enter the network ID and password of the light.

After enabling this function, LED indicator will be turned on all the time. Disabling this function will not affect the usage of the device, but the power state of the lightstrip cannot be determined through light.
The device will be automatically turned off when timer ends.
Device will be flashing to notify in order to help you manage your working and resting time.

Yeelight lights up your life, a companion\n of lifetime.

Please turn on your device and have your phone close by
The device will automatically switch to lower brightness Night Mode when it is turned on through remote controller or app.
Joining existing Ambiance Lamp group, a single light switch in the group could control all the devices at the same time.
Group name and password are used to access this group, please keep them secure. If you forgot the password, please reset your Ambiance Lamp to factory default.
